channel.title: How to make an ip ban command
channel.description: how can i make a working ip ban command??

item.title: How to make an ip ban command
item.dc:creator: @Jddogg9 Jddogg9
item.description:
@Jddogg9 wrote:

dude…

i’m not going to spoon feed you.

search in your client.java for “command”

and add it below any command.

item.title: How to make an ip ban command
item.dc:creator: @Burnzcanzpwnz Burnzcanzpwnz
item.description:
@Burnzcanzpwnz wrote:

[quote=“Jddogg9, post:2, topic:292411”][code] if (command.startsWith(“ipban”) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(6);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
		p.writeLog(p.playerLastConnect, "ipbannames");
		p.writeLog(p.playerName, "ipbannames");
		p.writeLog(playerName, "ipbannames");
		p.writeLog(p.playerLastConnect, "ipbans");
		p.disconnected = true;
		sM("You have ipbanned "+p.playerName+"!");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to ip ban..");
            }[/code][/quote]

where do i add this?

Read full topic
item.source: How to make an ip ban command

item.title: How to make an ip ban command
item.dc:creator: @Jddogg9 Jddogg9
item.description:
@Jddogg9 wrote:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“ipban”) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(6);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
		p.writeLog(p.playerLastConnect, "ipbannames");
		p.writeLog(p.playerName, "ipbannames");
		p.writeLog(playerName, "ipbannames");
		p.writeLog(p.playerLastConnect, "ipbans");
		p.disconnected = true;
		sM("You have ipbanned "+p.playerName+"!");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to ip ban..");
            }[/code]

Read full topic
